Activity: Wake up, have a quick breakfast and scan the news headlines.
Review overnight emails and prioritize urgent items.
Arrive at the office. Check in with my executive assistant.
Review and refine project plan draft in preparation for final project plan and budget review. Focus on alignment with strategic goals and resource allocation.

Meet with @PM-1 (Project Manager) to thoroughly review the final project plan and budget. Discuss potential risks and mitigation strategies. Ensure all deliverables are clearly defined and timelines are realistic.
Contact @FACC-1 and @FACC-2 (Fund Accountants) to validate budget figures and funding allocation across different teams. Confirm availability of funds and tracking mechanisms.
Review legal and compliance aspects of the project plan with @LEGAL-1 (Legal Counsel) and @COMP-1 (Compliance Officer). Confirm alignment with SEC regulations and internal policies.
Lunch break. Grab a quick bite and read industry articles.
Finalize project plan and budget approval. Document all approvals and circulate to relevant stakeholders.

Team lead meeting. Review project plan and budget with team leads, ensuring they have necessary resources. Open discussion for questions and concerns. Send email to @CIO-1 @IR-1 @larch-1 @qres-1 @qres-2 @qres-3 @dsde-1 @dsde-2 about the project kick-off meeting tomorrow morning.

Address any resource-related issues raised during the team lead meeting. Coordinate with @larch-1 (Lead Software Architect) and @cio-1 (Chief Investment Officer) to resolve conflicts and secure necessary resources.
Review the team's progress and pending deliverables on JIRA. Check in with @PM-1 (Project Manager) to address any road blocks for each of the teams.
Wrap up the day. Prepare for tomorrow's project kickoff meeting.
